11:T3772,<h1>OpenClaw Skill æ·±åº¦å®è·µæŒ‡å—ï¼šä»å…¥é—¨åˆ°ç²¾é€š</h1>
<p>OpenClaw çš„ Skill ç³»ç»Ÿæ˜¯å…¶æœ€å¼ºå¤§çš„ç‰¹æ€§ä¹‹ä¸€ï¼Œå®ƒè®© AI åŠ©æ‰‹èƒ½å¤ŸæŒæ¡ä¸“ä¸šæŠ€èƒ½ï¼Œå¤„ç†å¤æ‚ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚æœ¬æ–‡å°†å¸¦ä½ ä»åŸºç¡€ä½¿ç”¨åˆ°é«˜çº§å¼€å‘ï¼Œå…¨é¢æŒæ¡ Skill ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚</p>
<hr>
<h2>ç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šç†è§£ Skill ç³»ç»Ÿ</h2>
<h3>1.1 ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ Skillï¼Ÿ</h3>
<p><strong>Skillï¼ˆæŠ€èƒ½ï¼‰</strong> æ˜¯ OpenClaw çš„æ¨¡å—åŒ–çŸ¥è¯†åŒ…ã€‚å¦‚æœæŠŠ AI åŠ©æ‰‹æ¯”ä½œä¸€ä½å‘˜å·¥ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>åŸºç¡€èƒ½åŠ›</strong> = é€šè¯†æ•™è‚²ï¼ˆé˜…è¯»ã€å†™ä½œã€æ¨ç†ï¼‰</li>
<li><strong>Skill</strong> = ä¸“ä¸šåŸ¹è®­ï¼ˆä¼šè®¡è¯ä¹¦ã€ç¼–ç¨‹æŠ€èƒ½ã€è®¾è®¡èƒ½åŠ›ï¼‰</li>
</ul>
<p>å®‰è£…ä¸€ä¸ª Skillï¼Œå°±åƒç»™ AI åŠ©æ‰‹å‘æ”¾äº†æŸä¸ªé¢†åŸŸçš„"èŒä¸šèµ„æ ¼è¯ä¹¦"ï¼Œå®ƒå°±èƒ½å¤Ÿä½¿ç”¨è¯¥é¢†åŸŸçš„ä¸“ä¸šçŸ¥è¯†å’Œå·¥å…·ã€‚</p>
<h3>1.2 Skill çš„æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡</h3>
<p>Skill é‡‡ç”¨æ¨¡å—åŒ–è®¾è®¡ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ª Skill éƒ½æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹çš„å•å…ƒï¼ŒåŒ…å«ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>SKILL.md</strong>ï¼šæ ¸å¿ƒæ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œæè¿° Skill çš„åŠŸèƒ½å’Œä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•</li>
<li><strong>scripts/</strong>ï¼šå¯æ‰§è¡Œè„šæœ¬ï¼Œå®ç°å…·ä½“åŠŸèƒ½</li>
<li><strong>references/</strong>ï¼šå‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™ï¼Œè¯¦ç»†æ–‡æ¡£å’Œç¤ºä¾‹</li>
<li><strong>assets/</strong>ï¼šèµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ¨¡æ¿ã€å›¾æ ‡ç­‰</li>
</ul>
<h3>1.3 Skill vs Extension çš„åŒºåˆ«</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>ç»´åº¦</th>
<th>Skill</th>
<th>Extension</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><strong>æœ¬è´¨</strong></td>
<td>çŸ¥è¯†åŒ… + å·¥ä½œæµ</td>
<td>ä»£ç æ‰©å±•</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>å¼€å‘è¯­è¨€</strong></td>
<td>Markdown + ä»»æ„è„šæœ¬</td>
<td>TypeScript/JavaScript</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>å®‰è£…ä½ç½®</strong></td>
<td>~/.openclaw/skills/</td>
<td>~/.openclaw/extensions/</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>è¿è¡Œæ–¹å¼</strong></td>
<td>è¢« Agent åŠ è½½æ‰§è¡Œ</td>
<td>ç‹¬ç«‹è¿›ç¨‹</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯</strong></td>
<td>é¢†åŸŸçŸ¥è¯†ã€å¤æ‚æµç¨‹</td>
<td>æ–°å·¥å…·ã€æ–°é€šé“</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p><strong>ç®€å•è®°å¿†</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>éœ€è¦<strong>æ•™ AI æ€ä¹ˆåš</strong> â†’ ç”¨ Skill</li>
<li>éœ€è¦<strong>ç»™ AI æ–°èƒ½åŠ›</strong> â†’ ç”¨ Extension</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>ç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šSkill ä½¿ç”¨å®æˆ˜</h2>
<h3>2.1 å®‰è£…ä¸ç®¡ç†</h3>
<h4>é€šè¿‡ ClawHub å®‰è£…ï¼ˆæ¨èï¼‰</h4>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># 1. æœç´¢å¯ç”¨çš„ Skills
$ clawhub search pdf

æœç´¢ç»“æœ:
  ğŸ“¦ pdf-processor
     ç‰ˆæœ¬: 1.2.0
     æè¿°: ä¸“ä¸šçš„ PDF å¤„ç†å·¥å…·
     ä¸‹è½½é‡: 1,234
     è¯„åˆ†: â­â­â­â­â­ (4.8)

# 2. å®‰è£…æŒ‡å®š Skill
$ clawhub install pdf-processor
âœ“ å®‰è£…å®Œæˆï¼

# 3. æŸ¥çœ‹å·²å®‰è£…çš„ Skills
$ clawhub list
å·²å®‰è£… Skills (5):
  âœ“ pdf-processor    1.2.0   PDF å¤„ç†
  âœ“ weather          2.1.0   å¤©æ°”æŸ¥è¯¢
  âœ“ github           1.5.2   GitHub æ“ä½œ

# 4. æ›´æ–° Skill
$ clawhub update pdf-processor
âœ“ æ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ

# 5. å¸è½½ Skill
$ clawhub uninstall nano-pdf
âœ“ å·²å¸è½½
</code></pre>
<h4>æ‰‹åŠ¨å®‰è£…</h4>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># ä»æœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶å®‰è£…
$ openclaw skill install ./my-custom-skill.skill

# ä» Git ä»“åº“å®‰è£…
$ openclaw skill install https://github.com/username/my-skill

# å¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼å®‰è£…
$ openclaw skill install . --dev
</code></pre>
<h3>2.2 å®é™…ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯</h3>
<h4>åœºæ™¯ä¸€ï¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æ–‡æ¡£å¤„ç†å·¥ä½œæµ</h4>
<p><strong>éœ€æ±‚</strong>ï¼šæ¯å‘¨äº”éœ€è¦æ•´ç†ä¸€ä»½å‘¨æŠ¥ï¼ŒåŒ…å«ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li>ä»å„ä¸ªæ¸ é“æ”¶é›†æ•°æ®</li>
<li>ç”Ÿæˆ PDF æŠ¥å‘Š</li>
<li>å‘é€é‚®ä»¶ç»™å›¢é˜Ÿ</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>ä½¿ç”¨ Skills</strong>:</p>
<pre><code>ç”¨æˆ·ï¼šå¸®æˆ‘ç”Ÿæˆæœ¬å‘¨çš„æ•°æ®æŠ¥å‘Š

Agentï¼šæˆ‘æ¥å¸®æ‚¨å¤„ç†...

[ä½¿ç”¨ web_fetch Skill]
- ä»å†…éƒ¨ç³»ç»ŸæŠ“å–æœ¬å‘¨æ•°æ®
- æ•´ç†æˆç»“æ„åŒ–æ ¼å¼

[ä½¿ç”¨ pdf-processor Skill]
- åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼åŒ–çš„ PDF æŠ¥å‘Š
- æ·»åŠ é¡µçœ‰é¡µè„šå’Œå…¬å¸ Logo

[ä½¿ç”¨ himalaya Skill]
- æ’°å†™é‚®ä»¶æ­£æ–‡
- å‘é€ç»™å›¢é˜Ÿæˆå‘˜

âœ“ å‘¨æŠ¥å·²ç”Ÿæˆå¹¶å‘é€ï¼
</code></pre>
<h4>åœºæ™¯äºŒï¼šå¼€å‘å·¥ä½œæµè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–</h4>
<pre><code>ç”¨æˆ·ï¼šæˆ‘è¦å¼€å§‹å¼€å‘ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå¸®æˆ‘åˆå§‹åŒ–

Agentï¼šå¥½çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘æ¥å¸®æ‚¨è®¾ç½®...

[ä½¿ç”¨ github Skill]
- åˆ›å»ºæ–°åˆ†æ”¯ feature/user-authentication

[ä½¿ç”¨ coding-agent Skill]
- ç”Ÿæˆé¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„å’ŒåŸºç¡€ä»£ç 

[ä½¿ç”¨ healthcheck Skill]
- æ£€æŸ¥å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒé…ç½®

âœ“ å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒå·²å°±ç»ªï¼
</code></pre>
<h3>2.3 é«˜çº§ä½¿ç”¨æŠ€å·§</h3>
<h4>æŠ€å·§ 1ï¼šSkill ç»„åˆç­–ç•¥</h4>
<p><strong>é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œæ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼š</p>
<pre><code>ä»»åŠ¡ A â†’ Skill 1 â†’ ç»“æœ â†’ Skill 2 â†’ ç»“æœ â†’ Skill 3 â†’ å®Œæˆ
</code></pre>
<p><strong>æ¡ä»¶åˆ†æ”¯æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼š</p>
<pre><code>ä»»åŠ¡ â†’ Skill A (åˆ¤æ–­) â†’ 
  â”œâ”€ æ¡ä»¶1 â†’ Skill B â†’ å®Œæˆ
  â””â”€ æ¡ä»¶2 â†’ Skill C â†’ å®Œæˆ
</code></pre>
<h4>æŠ€å·§ 2ï¼šä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç®¡ç†</h4>
<p>åœ¨å¯¹è¯ä¸­æ˜ç¡®æŒ‡å®šä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼š</p>
<pre><code>ç”¨æˆ·ï¼šå…ˆç”¨ pdf-processor æå–ç¬¬ä¸€é¡µï¼Œ
     ç„¶åç”¨ docx-editor åˆ›å»ºæ–°æ–‡æ¡£æ’å…¥å†…å®¹

Agentï¼šæ˜ç™½ã€‚æˆ‘æŒ‰é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œï¼š
       1. ä½¿ç”¨ pdf-processor æå–ç¬¬ 1 é¡µ
       2. å°†æå–çš„å†…å®¹ä¼ é€’ç»™ docx-editor
       3. åˆ›å»ºæ–°æ–‡æ¡£å¹¶æ’å…¥
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>ç¬¬ä¸‰éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šSkill å¼€å‘å®æˆ˜</h2>
<h3>3.1 å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒå‡†å¤‡</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># 1. å®‰è£… Skill Creator å·¥å…·
$ clawhub install skill-creator

# 2. åˆ›å»ºå·¥ä½œç›®å½•
$ mkdir -p ~/openclaw-skills
$ cd ~/openclaw-skills
</code></pre>
<h3>3.2 å®Œæ•´å¼€å‘æµç¨‹</h3>
<h4>æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼šå¼€å‘ä¸€ä¸ªã€Œç½‘ç«™ç›‘æ§ã€Skill</h4>
<p><strong>Step 1ï¼šéœ€æ±‚åˆ†æ</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-markdown">## éœ€æ±‚è§„æ ¼è¯´æ˜ä¹¦

**Skill åç§°**: website-monitor
**ç›®æ ‡ç”¨æˆ·**: ç½‘ç«™è¿ç»´äººå‘˜ã€ä¸ªäººç«™é•¿
**æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½**:
1. ç›‘æ§ç½‘ç«™å¯ç”¨æ€§ï¼ˆHTTP çŠ¶æ€æ£€æŸ¥ï¼‰
2. æ£€æŸ¥ SSL è¯ä¹¦è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´
3. æ£€æµ‹ç½‘é¡µå†…å®¹å˜åŒ–
4. ç”Ÿæˆç›‘æ§æŠ¥å‘Š
</code></pre>
<p><strong>Step 2ï¼šåˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ openclaw skill create website-monitor

ç›®å½•ç»“æ„ï¼š
website-monitor/
â”œâ”€â”€ SKILL.md              # æ ¸å¿ƒæ–‡æ¡£
â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ check_http.py     # HTTP æ£€æŸ¥è„šæœ¬
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ check_ssl.py      # SSL è¯ä¹¦æ£€æŸ¥
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ generate_report.py # æŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆ
â”œâ”€â”€ references/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ api_reference.md  # API æ–‡æ¡£
â””â”€â”€ assets/
    â””â”€â”€ report_template.html
</code></pre>
<p><strong>Step 3ï¼šç¼–å†™ SKILL.md</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-markdown">---
name: website-monitor
description: |
  ç½‘ç«™ç›‘æ§å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ HTTP çŠ¶æ€æ£€æŸ¥ã€SSL è¯ä¹¦ç›‘æ§ã€
  å†…å®¹å˜åŒ–æ£€æµ‹å’ŒæŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºç½‘ç«™è¿ç»´ã€å¯ç”¨æ€§ç›‘æ§åœºæ™¯ã€‚
---

# Website Monitor Skill

## å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹

### æ£€æŸ¥å•ä¸ªç½‘ç«™

```bash
# æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç«™ HTTP çŠ¶æ€
python scripts/check_http.py https://example.com
</code></pre>
<h3>æ£€æŸ¥ SSL è¯ä¹¦</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">python scripts/check_ssl.py https://example.com
</code></pre>
<h2>å®Œæ•´ç¤ºä¾‹</h2>
<h3>åœºæ™¯ï¼šç›‘æ§å…¬å¸å®˜ç½‘</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># 1. åˆ›å»ºç›‘æ§åˆ—è¡¨
cat > websites.txt &#x3C;&#x3C; 'EOF'
https://company.com
https://blog.company.com
EOF

# 2. æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æ£€æŸ¥
python scripts/check_http.py --file websites.txt --output status.json

# 3. ç”Ÿæˆæ—¥æŠ¥
python scripts/generate_report.py --input status.json --format html
</code></pre>
<pre><code>
**Step 4ï¼šå®ç°æ ¸å¿ƒè„šæœ¬**

```python
# scripts/check_http.py
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""HTTP çŠ¶æ€æ£€æŸ¥è„šæœ¬"""

import sys
import json
import urllib.request
from datetime import datetime


def check_website(url: str, timeout: int = 10000):
    """æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç«™ HTTP çŠ¶æ€"""
    result = {
        "url": url,
        "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
        "status": None,
        "response_time": None,
        "error": None
    }
    
    try:
        import time
        start_time = time.time()
        
        req = urllib.request.Request(
            url,
            headers={'User-Agent': 'WebsiteMonitor/1.0'}
        )
        
        with urllib.request.urlopen(req, timeout=timeout/1000) as response:
            result["status"] = response.getcode()
            result["response_time"] = round((time.time() - start_time) * 1000, 2)
                        
    except Exception as e:
        result["error"] = str(e)
    
    return result


if __name__ == '__main__':
    import argparse
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
    parser.add_argument('url')
    args = parser.parse_args()
    
    result = check_website(args.url)
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
</code></pre>
<p><strong>Step 5ï¼šæµ‹è¯• Skill</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># 1. å¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼å®‰è£…
$ cd website-monitor
$ openclaw skill install . --dev

# 2. æµ‹è¯•è„šæœ¬
$ python scripts/check_http.py https://example.com
{
  "url": "https://example.com",
  "status": 200,
  "response_time": 234.56
}
</code></pre>
<p><strong>Step 6ï¼šæ‰“åŒ…å’Œå‘å¸ƒ</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># 1. è¿è¡Œæµ‹è¯•
$ openclaw skill test .
âœ“ æ‰€æœ‰æµ‹è¯•é€šè¿‡

# 2. æ‰“åŒ…
$ openclaw skill package .
âœ“ åˆ›å»º website-monitor.skill (45KB)

# 3. å‘å¸ƒ
$ clawhub publish website-monitor.skill
âœ“ Skill å·²å‘å¸ƒï¼
</code></pre>
<h3>3.3 é«˜çº§å¼€å‘æŠ€å·§</h3>
<h4>æŠ€å·§ 1ï¼šå‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒå’Œé”™è¯¯å¤„ç†</h4>
<pre><code class="language-python">def validate_url(url: str) -> bool:
    """éªŒè¯ URL æ ¼å¼"""
    import re
    pattern = r'^https?://[^\s/$.?#].[^\s]*$'
    return bool(re.match(pattern, url))


def check_website(url: str, timeout: int = 10000):
    # å‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒ
    if not validate_url(url):
        return {
            "error": "æ— æ•ˆçš„ URL æ ¼å¼",
            "hint": "è¯·ä½¿ç”¨ http:// æˆ– https:// å¼€å¤´çš„å®Œæ•´ URL"
        }
    
    # ... ä¸»é€»è¾‘
</code></pre>
<h4>æŠ€å·§ 2ï¼šç¼“å­˜æœºåˆ¶</h4>
<pre><code class="language-python">import hashlib
import json
from pathlib import Path

CACHE_DIR = Path.home() / '.cache' / 'website-monitor'

def get_cache_key(url: str) -> str:
    return hashlib.md5(url.encode()).hexdigest()

def get_cached_result(url: str, max_age: int = 300):
    """è·å–ç¼“å­˜çš„ç»“æœï¼Œé»˜è®¤ 5 åˆ†é’Ÿ"""
    cache_file = CACHE_DIR / f"{get_cache_key(url)}.json"
    
    if not cache_file.exists():
        return None
    
    import time
    if time.time() - cache_file.stat().st_mtime > max_age:
        return None
    
    with open(cache_file) as f:
        return json.load(f)
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>ç¬¬å››éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šæœ€ä½³å®è·µä¸å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜</h2>
<h3>4.1 Skill è®¾è®¡åŸåˆ™</h3>
<h4>DOï¼ˆæ¨èï¼‰</h4>
<p>âœ… <strong>å•ä¸€èŒè´£</strong>ï¼šä¸€ä¸ª Skill åªåšä¸€ç±»äº‹æƒ…</p>
<p>âœ… <strong>æ¸è¿›å¼å¤æ‚åº¦</strong>ï¼šæä¾›ç®€å•å…¥å£ï¼Œå¤æ‚åŠŸèƒ½å¯é€‰</p>
<p>âœ… <strong>é˜²å¾¡æ€§ç¼–ç¨‹</strong>ï¼šå¤„ç†å„ç§è¾¹ç•Œæƒ…å†µ</p>
<p>âœ… <strong>æ¸…æ™°é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯</strong>ï¼šè®©ç”¨æˆ·çŸ¥é“å‘ç”Ÿäº†ä»€ä¹ˆ</p>
<h4>DON'Tï¼ˆé¿å…ï¼‰</h4>
<p>âŒ <strong>è¿‡åº¦è®¾è®¡</strong>ï¼šç®€å•çš„ä»»åŠ¡ä¸éœ€è¦å¤æ‚çš„ Skill</p>
<p>âŒ <strong>é‡å¤é€ è½®å­</strong>ï¼šæ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²æœ‰ç±»ä¼¼ Skill</p>
<p>âŒ <strong>ç¡¬ç¼–ç è·¯å¾„</strong>ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„æˆ–é…ç½®</p>
<h3>4.2 æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–</h3>
<h4>1. å‡å°‘ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å ç”¨</h4>
<pre><code class="language-markdown"># SKILL.md ç»“æ„ä¼˜åŒ–

## å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹ï¼ˆ&#x3C; 50 è¡Œï¼‰
æ ¸å¿ƒå†…å®¹ï¼Œæ€»æ˜¯è¢«åŠ è½½

## è¯¦ç»†æ–‡æ¡£ï¼ˆ> 100 è¡Œï¼‰
ç§»åˆ° references/detailed.md
åªåœ¨éœ€è¦æ—¶åŠ è½½
</code></pre>
<h4>2. å¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†</h4>
<pre><code class="language-python">import asyncio
import aiohttp

async def check_multiple_urls(urls):
    """å¼‚æ­¥å¹¶å‘æ£€æŸ¥å¤šä¸ª URL"""
    async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
        tasks = [check_url(session, url) for url in urls]
        return await asyncio.gather(*tasks)
</code></pre>
<h3>4.3 å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜ FAQ</h3>
<p><strong>Q: Skill å®‰è£…åæ— æ³•ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Ÿ</strong></p>
<p>æ£€æŸ¥æ­¥éª¤ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li><code>clawhub list</code> ç¡®è®¤å·²å®‰è£…</li>
<li>æ£€æŸ¥ SKILL.md æè¿°æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«ä½ çš„ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯</li>
<li>æŸ¥çœ‹ OpenClaw æ—¥å¿—æ˜¯å¦æœ‰åŠ è½½é”™è¯¯</li>
<li>å°è¯•é‡å¯ OpenClaw Gateway</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Q: å¦‚ä½•è°ƒè¯• Skillï¼Ÿ</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># 1. å¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼å®‰è£…ï¼ˆä¿®æ”¹åè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼‰
openclaw skill install . --dev

# 2. æŸ¥çœ‹è¯¦ç»†æ—¥å¿—
openclaw logs --follow | grep skill-name

# 3. æ‰‹åŠ¨æµ‹è¯•è„šæœ¬
python scripts/your_script.py --debug
</code></pre>
<p><strong>Q: Skill å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»– Skill å—ï¼Ÿ</strong></p>
<p>ç›®å‰ä¸ç›´æ¥æ”¯æŒï¼Œä½†å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹å¼åä½œï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li><strong>é“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨</strong>ï¼šè®©ç”¨æˆ·æŒ‰é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œå¤šä¸ª Skills</li>
<li><strong>è„šæœ¬ç»„åˆ</strong>ï¼šåœ¨ scripts/ ä¸­è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»– Skill çš„è„šæœ¬</li>
<li><strong>å…±äº«åº“</strong>ï¼šå°†å…¬å…±åŠŸèƒ½æå–ä¸º Python æ¨¡å—</li>
</ol>
<h3>4.4 è°ƒè¯•æŠ€å·§</h3>
<h4>å¯ç”¨è¯¦ç»†æ—¥å¿—</h4>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># åœ¨ openclaw.json ä¸­å¯ç”¨è°ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼
{
  "debug": true,
  "log_level": "verbose"
}
</code></pre>
<h4>æ€§èƒ½åˆ†æ</h4>
<pre><code class="language-python">import time
import functools

def timing(func):
    @functools.wraps(func)
    def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        start = time.perf_counter()
        result = func(*args, **kwargs)
        elapsed = time.perf_counter() - start
        print(f"{func.__name__} è€—æ—¶: {elapsed:.2f}s")
        return result
    return wrapper

@timing
def slow_operation():
    pass
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>æ€»ç»“</h2>
<p>é€šè¿‡æœ¬æ–‡ï¼Œä½ åº”è¯¥å·²ç»æŒæ¡äº†ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li><strong>åŸºç¡€ä½¿ç”¨</strong>ï¼šå®‰è£…ã€ç®¡ç†ã€ç»„åˆ Skills</li>
<li><strong>é«˜çº§æŠ€å·§</strong>ï¼šä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç®¡ç†ã€é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†ã€æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–</li>
<li><strong>å¼€å‘èƒ½åŠ›</strong>ï¼šä»é›¶å¼€å‘ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„ Skill</li>
<li><strong>æœ€ä½³å®è·µ</strong>ï¼šè®¾è®¡åŸåˆ™ã€è°ƒè¯•æŠ€å·§ã€FAQ</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥å»ºè®®</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li>å°è¯•å¼€å‘ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„ä¸ªäºº Skill</li>
<li>åˆ†äº«åˆ°ç¤¾åŒºï¼Œè·å–åé¦ˆ</li>
<li>è¿­ä»£ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆå‘å¸ƒåˆ° ClawHub</li>

<p>è®°ä½ï¼š<strong>æœ€å¥½çš„ Skill æ¥è‡ªäºè§£å†³çœŸå®é—®é¢˜</strong>ã€‚ä»ä½ è‡ªå·±çš„éœ€æ±‚å‡ºå‘ï¼Œå¼€å‘å¯¹ä½ æœ‰ç”¨çš„ Skillï¼Œç„¶ååˆ†äº«ç»™ç¤¾åŒºï¼</p>
